message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to pay closer to $85. What do you think?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to think about my own profit margin. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $87.50.
